baseSetSize.description: Number of cards in the set. Will default to {{code:totalSetSize}} if not available. Note that Wizards sometimes prints extra cards beyond the set size into promos or supplemental products.

block.description: Block name the set was in.

boosterV3.description: The card rarity contents of a typical booster pack.

cards.description: List of cards in this set.

codeV3.description: Alternate set code Wizards uses for a select few duel deck sets.

isFoilOnly.description: Is the set available only in foil?

isOnlineOnly.description: Is the set available online only?

keyruneCode.description: The matching keyrune code for {{external:Keyrune$https://andrewgioia.github.io/Keyrune/}} image icons.

mcmName.description: The Magic Card Market set name.

mcmId.description: The Magic Card Market set ID.

mtgoCode.description: Set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online.

parentCode.description: The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.

releaseDate.description: Release date in {{external:ISO-8601$https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html}} format for the set.

tcgplayerGroupId.description: Group ID of the set on TCGPlayer.

tokens.description: Tokens available to the set. See the {{link:token}} structure.

totalSetSize.description: Total number of cards in the set, including promos and related supplemental products.

translations.description: Translated set name by language. See the {{link:translations}} structure.

type.description: As of 03-28-2019, the possible values are {{code:archenemy}}, {{code:box}}, {{code:core}}, {{code:commander}}, {{code:draft_innovation}}, {{code:duel_deck}}, {{code:expansion}}, {{code:from_the_vault}}, {{code:funny}}, {{code:masters}}, {{code:masterpiece}}, {{code:memorabilia}}, {{code:spellbook}}, {{code:planechase}}, {{code:premium_deck}}, {{code:promo}}, {{code:starter}}, {{code:token}}, {{code:treasure_chest}} or {{code:vanguard}}
